what.title: What is Home Automation?
what.content: True home automation is more than just a collection of "smart" gadgets; it is the creation of a unified ecosystem. It connects your lighting, curtains, climate, entertainment, and security into a single "central nervous system." Instead of managing five different remotes or apps, your home acts as one cohesive entity that responds to you instantly.

why.title: Why Do You Need It?
why.intro: In a modern home, technology should simplify life, not complicate it.

points.title: Simplicity
points.description: Replace a wall full of confusing switches with one elegant keypad.

points.title: Efficiency
points.description: Your home automatically regulates energy usage—turning off geysers when not needed or adjusting shades to harvest natural light.

points.title: Ambience
points.description: Change the entire mood of a room—lighting, music, and temperature—instantly to suit the occasion.

points.title: Peace of Mind
points.description: Whether you are in the bedroom or on vacation, you have complete visibility and control over your home's security.

how.title: How Does It Work?
how.intro: At the heart of our systems lies a Controller (the brain).

steps.title: Input
steps.description: You press a button on a keypad or use a voice command.

steps.title: Processing
steps.description: The controller (from brands like RTI or SpeakerCraft) translates your command.

steps.title: Action
steps.description: The system simultaneously dims the lights, lowers the AC temperature, and starts your playlist.

capabilities.title: Lighting & Curtain Control
capabilities.subtitle: The Atmosphere of Luxury
capabilities.description: Lighting defines the mood of your home. We move beyond simple "on/off" to create intelligent "Scenes."

features.title: Automated Shading
features.description: We integrate motorized curtains and blinds that adjust automatically based on the time of day, protecting your interiors from harsh sunlight while maximizing energy efficiency.

features.title: Scene Setting
features.description: With a single touch of a button labeled "Dinner," the main lights dim, accent lights brighten, and the curtains close for privacy.

capabilities.title: Designer Keypads & Interfaces
capabilities.subtitle: Sophistication You Can Touch
capabilities.description: Eliminate "wall acne"—the clutter of multiple plastic switches. We replace them with architectural interfaces that double as design elements.

features.title: Luxury Materials
features.description: We feature Blacknova and Tyba keypads, renowned for their premium materials and flush-mount designs that blend seamlessly into modern interiors.

features.title: Glass Touch Panels
features.description: Experience the Schneider Electric and Eelectron ranges, featuring capacitive glass surfaces that offer intuitive control with a sleek, minimalist aesthetic.

capabilities.title: Climate & Comfort Intelligence
capabilities.subtitle: The Perfect Environment, Always
capabilities.description: Manage your comfort without the hassle. Our systems integrate deeply with your HVAC and electrical infrastructure.

features.title: Holistic Control
features.description: We automate Fans, Air Conditioning, and Geysers, ensuring high-energy devices run only when needed.

features.title: Smart Thermostats
features.description: Using Eelectron interfaces, the system monitors temperature and humidity, adjusting the climate automatically to maintain your ideal set point.

capabilities.title: Garden & Outdoor Automation
capabilities.subtitle: Extend Your Living Space
capabilities.description: Intelligence shouldn't stop at the back door. We bring automation to your exterior spaces.

features.title: Landscape Lighting
features.description: Schedule your garden lights to welcome you home at sunset.

features.title: Irrigation Control
features.description: Smart scheduling ensures your garden is watered efficiently based on weather conditions.

features.title: Outdoor Entertainment
features.description: We integrate outdoor audio solutions (like Garvan Acoustic's "LOTO" or SpeakerCraft landscape speakers) that blend into the foliage while delivering high-fidelity sound.

capabilities.title: Unified Control Ecosystems
capabilities.subtitle: One Brain, Total Control
capabilities.description: Connect your devices into a single app or remote.

features.title: The Hub
features.description: We utilize powerful processors from RTI and Pro Control to bridge the gap between your TV, music, and home systems.

features.title: Universal Remotes
features.description: Put down the five different remotes. Our handheld controllers allow you to manage the TV, Apple TV, Sound System, and Lights from one ergonomic device.

faq.question: Can I control my home when I am away?
faq.answer: Yes. Our systems from RTI and Schneider offer secure remote access apps, allowing you to monitor cameras, unlock doors, or adjust the AC from anywhere in the world.

faq.question: Is the system scalable?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We can start by automating a single room—like a Home Cinema or Living Room—and expand to the rest of the house later.

faq.question: What brands do you work with?
faq.answer: We partner exclusively with heritage brands and innovators including RTI, Pro Control, Schneider Electric, Eelectron, Blacknova, Tyba, and many more.

faq.question: How long does installation take?
faq.answer: Installation timelines vary based on project scope. A single-room automation can be completed in 1-2 days, while a full-home system typically takes 1-2 weeks.
